templates.template: swagger: "2.0"
paths: /${}: get: responses: '200': description: OK

OAuth2Scheme: type: oauth2 scopes: user: Grants read/write access to profile info only. flow: accessCode authorizationUrl: https://github.com/login/oauth/authorize tokenUrl: https://github.com/login/oauth/access_token
definitions: ${model}: title: "${model}" type: string
/resource: get: responses: '${200}': description: OK schema: $$ref: ${model}
/resources: get: responses: '${200}': description: OK schema: $$ref: ${model}
get: summary: Read description: Provide details for the entire list (for collection resources) or an item (for object resources) responses: '${200}': description: ${OK} schema: $$ref: ${model}
post: summary: Create description: Create a new item parameters: - name: ${request} in: body required: true schema: $$ref: ${model} responses: '${200}': description: OK schema: $$ref: ${model}
put: summary: Update description: Update the entire list (for collection resources) or an item (for object resources) responses: '${200}': description: OK schema: $$ref: ${model}
delete: summary: Delete description: Delete the entire list (for collection resources) or an item (for object resources) responses: '${200}': description: OK schema: $$ref: ${model}
patch: summary: Partial update description: ${Update} parameters: - name: ${request} in: body required: true schema: $$ref: ${model} responses: '${200}': description: OK schema: $$ref: ${model}
options: summary: Request resource options description: Request information about methods available for resource manipulation responses: '${200}': description: OK
head: summary: Query a resource in the server description: HEAD sends request and get the response only in the header, the body should not be used responses: '${200}': description: OK
2${00}: description: ${OK}
4${00}: description: ${Client} error
5${00}: description: ${Server} error
required: - ${name} properties: ${name}: type: ${string} description: type: string
